thread.title: Jack Dorsey Tweets His Goals as the CEO of Both Twitter and Square
thread.title_full: Jack Dorsey Tweets His Goals as the CEO of Both Twitter and Square - Bloomberg Business

author: Julie Verhage
title: Jack Dorsey Tweets His Goals as the CEO of Both Twitter and Square
text:
After much speculation, Twitter finally announced that co-founder Jack Dorsey will be its chief executive officer while also keeping his job as the head of mobile-payments firm Square Inc., another company he co-founded.
With the announcement, the CEO sent out a string of tweets promoting his vision of both companies, as well as other management announcements with Adam Bain becoming the COO of Twitter.
Here's more of what @jack had to say.
